title: Flash Burnout
description: Click.Telephoto lens. Zoom. In a shutter release millisecond, Blake’s world turns upside down. The nameless woman with the snake tattoo is not just another assignment. “That’s my mom!” gasps Marissa.Click.Saturated self-portrait: Blake, nice guy, class clown, always trying to get a laugh, not sure where to focus.Click.Contrast. Shannon, Blake’s GF. Total. Babe. Marissa, just a friend and fellow photographer. Shannon loves him; Marissa needs him. How is he supposed to frame them both in one shot?Click.Chiaroscuro. Lightdark. Marissa again, overexposed. Crash and burn.Talk about negative space.Click.
author: L.K. Madigan
